characters: Multiple pedestrians, cyclists, and drivers observed. Pedestrians include a child on the right side of the image, a person in a blue jacket on the right side, and a person in a yellow shirt on the left side. Cyclists include a person on a bicycle on the right side and a motorcyclist on the right side.
summary: The video sequence shows multiple instances of ghost probing behavior. In the first sequence, a child suddenly emerges from the right side of the image, darting into the driving lane from behind a parked vehicle. In the second sequence, a person in a blue jacket suddenly appears from the right side, entering the driving lane from behind a parked vehicle. In the third sequence, a person in a yellow shirt suddenly emerges from the left side, entering the driving lane from behind a parked vehicle. In the fourth sequence, a motorcyclist suddenly appears from the right side, entering the driving lane from behind a parked vehicle.
actions: The observer vehicle encounters multiple instances of ghost probing behavior, requiring immediate action to avoid collisions.
key_objects: Parked vehicles on both sides of the road, pedestrians, cyclists, and motorcyclists.
